nodes.text: Ofaree was a Human male Captain who was in command onboard the Aurora during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, Captain Ofaree worked alongside Jedi Master Kellian Jarro while serving as a deep space commando training center where Elite Special forces units practice boarding action scenarios. He was later killed by the Grand Champion of the Great Hunt who was here to kill the Jedi and Tarro Blood.
